place.name: ALTON PANCRAS
place.gazetteerText: ALTON-PANCRAS, a parish and a liberty in Dorchester district, Dorset. The parish lies on the Downs, 2½ miles NE of Cerne-Abbas, and 7 E by S of Evershot r. station. Post Town, Cerne under Dorchester. Acres, 2,243. Real property, £2,642. Pop., 270. Houses, 55. The property is subdivided. The parish is a meet for the Blackmoor harriers. The living is a vicarage in the dio cese of Salisbury. Value, £208.* Patrons, the Dean and Chapter of Salisbury. The church is good. The liberty is co-extensive with the parish. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
